pkgmetadata.longdescription: Further Resources to Assist Novice Developers // Assist novice developers when preparing a single package or a set of integrated packages to submit to CRAN. Provide additional resources to facilitate the automation of the following individual or batch processing: check local source packages; build local .tar.gz source files; install packages from local .tar.gz files; detect conflicts between function names in the environment. The additional resources include determining the identity and ordering of the packages to process when updating an imported package.
